title: In the past week, how much were you bothered by:
instructions: Below is a list of problems and complaints that people sometimes have in response to stressful life experiences. How much you have been bothered by that problem IN THE LAST MONTH.

questions.question: Feeling very upset when something reminds you of the stressful experience?
Trouble remembering important parts of the stressful experience?
Loss of interest in activities that you used to enjoy?
Irritable behaviour, angry outbursts, or acting aggressively??

question: Which choice of the choices below you think it will impact you stress the most?
